Question
========
  
A sample of 120 students studying at the Faculty of Social Sciences in Utrecht were asked what field of study they are currently pursuing and what their age is. How can the frequency distribution of field of study and age best be represented?

Answerlist

* Study direction with a bar graph and age with a histogram.
* Study direction with a histogram and age with a bar graph.
* Both with a bar graph.
* Both with a histogram.
